p:
Mosquito pools were suspended in tissue culture media and macerated using the Qiagen TissueLyser II instrument. Viral RNA was extracted and detected by dengue type-specific real-time reverse transcription PCR as described by Santiago et al.
23 PCR reactions with cycle threshold values below 37 were considered positive. Maximum likelihood estimates of the minimum infection rate for Ae. albopictus were calculated using PooledInfRate version 4.0 (Fort Collins, CO).
24
